title: Bug 2694 Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions (1GI6RPE)
description:
Bug 2694 Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions (1GI6RPE) press Add for the associated editors.
a. Multiple selection should be enabled.
c. The default entry in the associated editors list should be marked as '(default)' (similar to perspectives).
NOTES:
KLM (10/10/2001 1:54:57 PM)
Also:
f. The dialog needs a width hint.
g. The File editors Preferences page grows in height when selected, but no other pages do the same.

I have already fixed a, c, f and need to release.
